description: Ready in a flash, this fresh twist on the classic Waldorf salad featuring blueberries and nectarines is just what your barbecue spread needs.
name: Summer Waldorf Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 yellow peaches, halved, destoned, cut into thick wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a chargrill pan over medium-high heat. Spray peach wedges with oil, then cook for 2 minutes on each side or until lightly charred.
Place buttermilk, mayonnaise, vinegar and mustard in a small bowl and whisk to combine. Season with pepper.
Arrange leafy mix, celery, peach wedges, blueberries and walnuts on a platter. Drizzle over dressing. Serve seasoned with pepper.
